item.title: BTCPay Server version 1.0.3.147 is out!
item.description: Prior to this release, BTCPay was using BitcoinAverage as a source for rates for many exchanges and also as a default rate provider. The structural changes in BitcoinAverage pricing plans meant that users have to pay to use their API. While we understand and respect BitcoinAverage decision (they've been a reliable and free provider for years) we can't expect all our users to pay for the API.
